## LMSP-Tanzania Partners

We collaborate with organizations across Tanzania and the Western Indian Ocean region committed to advancing Local Marine Spatial Planning.

### Government Partners

- Tanzania Fisheries Service
- Ministry of Blue Economy & Fisheries
- Coastal Regional Administrations
- District Fisheries Offices

### Development Partners

- World Bank Marine Programs
- FAO Fisheries Division
- UNEP Regional Seas Programme
- GIZ Blue Economy Initiative

### Civil Society & NGOs

- Tanzania National Fisheries Association
- Coastal Environmental Center
- Community Development Organizations
- Environmental advocacy groups

### Academic & Research Institutions

- University of Dar es Salaam
- Institute of Marine Sciences
- Tanzania Fisheries Research Institute
- Regional research networks

### Private Sector

- Sustainable tourism operators
- Aquaculture enterprises
- Sustainable fisheries companies
- Blue economy innovators

### How to Join

Interested in collaborating with LMSP-Tanzania? 

We welcome partnerships with organizations working on MSP, fisheries, marine conservation, and coastal development. [Contact us](contact.qmd) to discuss collaboration opportunities.

**Partner Opportunities:**

- Co-host events and training
- Share research and data
- Joint publications and advocacy
- Resource pooling and coordination
